Yup I went swimming in the Oasis Lake!
Sthiel
Cazic-Thule

-----Original Message-----
From: Countess Bathory [mailto:countess_bathory_69@...]
Sent: Saturday, June 19, 1999 8:00 PM
To: shadowknight@onelist.com
Subject: [shadowknight] Shadow Step, Water and You


From: Countess Bathory <countess_bathory_69@...>

Just out of curiosity:

Has anyone else noticed that if there is water anywhere in your current
zone and you cast Shadow Step, you end up in the very middle and on the
bottom.

By the way.. Sand Giants can swim fast :)


Bathory D'Allatu
Minions of Darkness
Cazic-Thule
